4 import rospkg
5 from roboskin.sensor.lsm6ds3 import LSM6DS3_IMU
6 ROS_ROBOSKIN_DIR = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
7 CONFIG_DIR = os.path.join(ROS_ROBOSKIN_DIR, 'config')
8 
9 
10 def set_environment_variables(filename):
11  filepath = os.path.join(CONFIG_DIR, filename)
12 
13  with open(filepath, 'r') as f:
14  env_variables = yaml.load(f)
15 
16  # Check for ros_core_ip
17  if 'ros_core_ip' not in env_variables.keys():
18  raise ValueError('environment variables should include ros_core_ip')
19  ros_core_ip = env_variables['ros_core_ip']
20 
21  # Check for ros_core_port
22  if 'ros_core_port' in env_variables.keys():
23  ros_core_port = env_variables['ros_core_port']
24  else:
25  # Use Default port value
26  ros_core_port = '11311'
27 
28  os.environ["ROS_MASTER_URI"] = 'http://%s:%d' % (ros_core_ip, ros_core_port)
